page.title: 03TRANSPORT AT PURTON STOKE
page.content: A woman who lived in the Post office at Purton Stoke said that the Cheltenham bus company runs the bus route but it says on the timetable that Thamesdown Transport Service does the route. The bus comes at {9.22am}and leaves the village at {9.24am }and gets back to Wootton Bassett at{9.56am}.The bus leaves Wootton Bassett at{11.30am}and gets back at {12.02pm }.The bus comes once a week, that's on a Friday. The woman said they are very lucky to have a bus once a week because some villages have no buses Near the bus stop there is a derelict garage .
